title: RT News - October 24, 2019 (18:00 MSK)
text: Important pillars of a multipolar world - President Putin hails the rise of African nations at a landmark summit in the Russian resort city of Sochi. That's as two of Russia's strategic military bombers pay a visit to South Africa, as part of a push to deepen defense co-operation. The head of NATO endorses a German plan for an internationally run safe-zone in northern Syria - just days after a ceasefire brokered by Russia and Turkey came into effect. An accolade it can't shake off - Coca Cola retains the title of the world's top plastic polluter for a second year running.
description: Important pillars of a multipolar world - President Putin hails the rise of African nations at a landmark summit in the Russian resort city of Sochi
